Package game.engine.system

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game2DSystem
    GameSystem of this game engine this class includes 1. main loop of the game 2. handle key input method , and we support web by extending JApplet
    GameMain
    GameMain must be named with "GameName + Main" in order to catch this class by Game2DSystem
    InputEventTiny
    InputEventTiny類別
    存放鍵盤、滑鼠等狀態的類別。
    Queue
    Queue類別
    從Vector類別擴充出來的類別。
